page.title: 20Changes in Cheshunt
page.content: There have been many changes in our area over the past few years.The whole area is close to London and is inside the commuter belt.This means that people working in London can live in pleasant,country surroundings within easy reach of their work. {Cheshunt Cheshunt has recently had a big new Tescos Hypermarket built which has led to the building of new houses and flats in the area. {Goffs Oak { }The area around Goffs Oak is more in the country and the changes have taken place more slowly.Fifty years ago Goffs Oak was a very small village with only a few large houses.Today it is more like a small town with many more houses and its own small shopping centre.
